docs.title: Install, Setup, Test & Cleanup
docs.text:
LinuxmacOSWindows 
# Example Linux install
curl -sSL https://example.com/locom/install.sh | bash

brew install locom

winget install locom

docs.title: run
docs.text:
Run a task with the CLI.

mycli run <task_name>

docs.title: Welcome to My CLI Tool
docs.text:
Here’s a proof of concept showing tabs and rich formatting.

OverviewInstallationExamples

This is the overview tab. You can add Markdown styling like bold, italic, or lists:

  • Feature 1
  • Feature 2
  • Feature 3

Installation instructions go here:

pip install mycli

Examples tab:

mycli --help
mycli run task

You can also add collapsible sections:

Pro Tip

You can nest notes and highlights in Markdown.

docs.title: Advanced Options
docs.text:
• --verbose : detailed output
  • --config FILE : specify config file
